title: Which increases for real output to stay constant

content.question: When the average price level increases by 10 percent in a given year, which of the following must increase by 10 percent for real output to remain constant?

choices.label: The international value of the currency

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
